description: If you prefer to host a&nbsp;White Christmas, swerve from the usual hot chocolate and make a white hot chocolate instead! And to make it even better, spice things up with a little Fireball&nbsp;whiskey to create the ultimate comforting cocktail.To complete the festive theme, a dollop of whipped cream and a sprinkle of cinnamon is just what you need. Share a mug of this deliciousness with a friend to make the experience cozier!
